main_definition: Having a fashionable or elegant appearance; being well-dressed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fashionable, having an up-to-date and attractive style of dressing.
meanings_and_examples.example: She always looks stylish in her chic outfits.
His stylish suit gave him a polished look for the event.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Trendy and modern, often involving cutting-edge designs and colors.
meanings_and_examples.example: The fashion industry is constantly evolving with new styles that are extremely stylish.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Flamboyant or showy, possibly in a way that might be considered over the top.
meanings_and_examples.example: His flamboyant style of dressing sometimes draws too much attention.
